properties.name: lightId
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: on
properties.description: On/Off state of the light

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The light is not performing an alert effect

properties.name: Select
properties.description: The light is performing one breathe cycle

properties.name: LSelect
properties.description: The light is performing breathe cycles for 15 seconds or until an "alert": "none" command is received

properties.name: bri
properties.description: The brightness value to set the light to. Brightness is a scale from 1 (the minimum the light is capable of) to 254 (the maximum).

properties.name: bri_inc
properties.description: Increments or decrements the value of the brightness. This value is ignored if the Brightness attribute is provided.

properties.name: ct
properties.description: The Mired color temperature of the light. 2012 connected lights are capable of 153 (6500K) to 500 (2000K).

properties.name: ct_inc
properties.description: Increments or decrements the value of the ct. ct_inc is ignored if the ct attribute is provided.

properties.name: xy
properties.description: The x and y coordinates of a color in CIE color space. The first entry is the x coordinate and the second entry is the y coordinate. Both x and y are between 0 and 1

properties.name: xy_inc
properties.description: Increments or decrements the value of the xy. This value is ignored if the Coordinates attribute is provided. Any ongoing color transition is stopped. Max value [0.5, 0.5]

properties.name: hue
properties.description: The hue value to set light to.The hue value is a wrapping value between 0 and 65535. Both 0 and 65535 are red, 25500 is green and 46920 is blue.

properties.name: hue_inc
properties.description: Increments or decrements the value of the hue. Hue Increments is ignored if the Hue attribute is provided.

properties.name: sat
properties.description: Saturation of the light. 254 is the most saturated (colored) and 0 is the least saturated (white).

properties.name: sat_inc
properties.description: Increments or decrements the value of the sat. This value is ignored if the Saturation attribute is provided.

properties.name: transitiontime
properties.description: The duration in seconds of the transition from the lightâ€™s current state to the new state

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Delete a light

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Retrieve a light

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Retrieve many lights

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a light
